Title: Vengence
IMDB Description: Months after a few one night stands, New York City writer Ben finds out a girl he barely knows has died. He's talked into flying to the middle of nowhere in Texas for her funeral where her brother vows to find out who killed her... and seek vengeance.

Title: Five Nights at Freddy's
IMDB Description: A troubled security guard begins working at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. During his first night on the job, he realizes that the night shift won't be so easy to get through. Pretty soon he will unveil what actually happened at Freddy's.

Title: Four Christmases
IMDB Description: A couple struggles to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas.

Title: Fred Claus
IMDB Description: Fred Claus, Santa's bitter older brother, is forced to move to the North Pole to help Santa and the elves prepare for Christmas in exchange for cash.

Title: Home Alone
IMDB Description: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas Eve.

Title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
IMDB Description: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

Title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
IMDB Description: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

Title: The Fast and the Furious
IMDB Description: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

Title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
IMDB Description: An ancient prophecy seems to be coming true when a mysterious presence begins stalking the corridors of a school of magic and leaving its victims paralyzed.

Title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
IMDB Description: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

Title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
IMDB Description: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

Title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
IMDB Description: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

Title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
IMDB Description: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
IMDB Description: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

Title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
IMDB Description: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

Title: The Hunger Games
IMDB Description: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

Title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire
IMDB Description: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

Title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay: Part 1
IMDB Description: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

Title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay: Part 2
IMDB Description: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

Title: Bullet Train
IMDB Description: Five assassins aboard a swiftly-moving bullet train find out that their missions have something in common.
